name: CODENAME: Determination
description:
Welcome to CODENAME: Determination!

WARNING! Game development on here has been canceled! All game development has been taken to Game Jolt! Link: https://gamejolt.com/games/cn-d/335926

CODENAME: Determination is an online multiplayer game where you can (soon for both modes) roleplay and battle other players.

You play as a variety of characters.

The game is currently in Pre-Alpha phase. Always expect bugs every update.

Current Features

  • 20 Players Multiplayer Connection
  • Chatting
  • Player CHECKs
  • Skins and OCs

Currently Supported Platforms

  • Windows
  • Mac OS X
  • Linux
